{{Infobox National futsal team |Name = {{futsal|Japan}} |Badge = Japan national team.png |FIFA Trigramme = JPN |FIFA Rank = 10 [http://www.futsalworldranking.be/rank.htm Futsal World Ranking] |FIFA max = |FIFA max date = |FIFA min = |FIFA min date = |pattern_la1 = _JFA_10h |pattern_b1 = _JFA_10h_futsal |pattern_ra1 = _JFA_10h |pattern_sh1 = _adidasonwhite |pattern_so1 = _3_stripes_white |leftarm1 = FFFFFF |body1 = FFFFFF |rightarm1 = FFFFFF |shorts1 = 000080 |socks1 = 000080 |pattern_la2 = _JFA_10a |pattern_b2 = _JFA_10a_futsal |pattern_ra2 = _JFA_10a |pattern_sh2 = _adidaswhite |pattern_so2 = _3_stripes_blue |leftarm2 = FFFFFF |body2 = FFFFFF |rightarm2 = FFFFFF |shorts2 = 000080 |socks2 = FFFFFF |Nickname = ''ãµã ã©ã¤ã»ãã«ã¼''
(Samurai Blue) |Association = [[Japan Football Association]] |Sub=confederation = [[East Asian Football Federation|EAFF]] ([[East Asia]]) |Confederation = [[Asian Football Confederation|AFC]] ([[Asia]]) |Coach = Miguel Rodrigo |Captain = |Most caps = |Top scorer = |First game = |Largest loss = |Largest win = |World cup apps = 3 |World cup first = 1989 |World cup best = Round 1 ([[1989 FIFA Futsal World Championship|1989]]), ([[2004 FIFA Futsal World Cup|2004]]), ([[2008 FIFA Futsal World Cup|2008]]) |Regional name = [[AFC Futsal Championship]] |Regional cup apps = 11 |Regional cup first = [[1999 AFC Futsal Championship|1999]] |Regional cup best = [[Image:Med 1.png|16px]] Champions ([[2006 AFC Futsal Championship|2006]]) }} The '''Japan national futsal team''' represents [[Japan]] in international [[futsal]] competitions and is controlled by [[Japan Football Association]]. It is one of the strongest teams in Asia, the champions in the [[2006 AFC Futsal Championship|2006]] [[AFC Futsal Championship|Asian Futsal Championship]].{{cite web|title=Asian Futsal Championship Overview|url=http://www.rsssf.com/tablesf/futsal-as.html|publisher=[[RSSSF]]|accessdate=2006-11-16}} Japan has played in three [[FIFA Futsal World Championship]]s.{{cite web|title=FIFA Futsal World Cup Overview|url=http://www.rsssf.com/tablesf/futsal-wc.html|publisher=[[RSSSF]]|accessdate=2006-11-16}} ==Tournaments== ===[[FIFA Futsal World Cup]]=== * [[1989 FIFA Futsal World Championship|1989]] - Round 1 * [[1992 FIFA Futsal World Championship|1992]] - ''Didn't Qualify'' * [[1996 FIFA Futsal World Championship|1996]] - ''Didn't Qualify'' * [[2000 FIFA Futsal World Championship|2000]] - ''Didn't Qualify'' * [[2004 FIFA Futsal World Championship|2004]] - Round 1 * [[2008 FIFA Futsal World Cup|2008]] - Round 1 ===[[AFC Futsal Championship]]=== * [[1999 AFC Futsal Championship|1999]] - Fourth Place * [[2000 AFC Futsal Championship|2000]] - Fourth Place * [[2001 AFC Futsal Championship|2001]] - Fourth Place * [[2002 AFC Futsal Championship|2002]] - Runners-Up [[Image:Med 2.png|16px]] * [[2003 AFC Futsal Championship|2003]] - Runners-Up [[Image:Med 2.png|16px]] * [[2004 AFC Futsal Championship|2004]] - Runners-Up [[Image:Med 2.png|16px]] * [[2005 AFC Futsal Championship|2005]] - Runners-Up [[Image:Med 2.png|16px]] * [[2006 AFC Futsal Championship|2006]] - '''Champions''' [[Image:Med 1.png|16px]] * [[2007 AFC Futsal Championship|2007]] - Runners-Up [[Image:Med 2.png|16px]] * [[2008 AFC Futsal Championship|2008]] - Third Place [[Image:Med 3.png|16px]] * [[2010 AFC Futsal Championship|2010]] - Third Place [[Image:Med 3.png|16px]] ==References==
